name: Counter Agents
description: Counter Agents is a spy-themed, head-to-head multiplayer game where your objective is to sneak around guards, steal the briefcase, and make it to an exit point before your opponent!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10 Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.4Ghz or Higher / AMD 3Ghz or Higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities. DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 430 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Counter Agents is a pretty cool indie game, and one of the more enjoyable games that 'started as student projects' I have tried as of late. I think Counter Agents is worth checking out overall. I dont know exactly what kind of player I would recommend the game to but what I do know is I enjoyed it enough to recommend you at least take a look at it.
ayy an old school stealth game with multiplayer 9/10 (i end up squinting alot because only because i'm a little blind)
